text.section: At least once each month, the clerk of each circuit court shall report to the Secretary of State the names and offices of all officers who have taken and subscribed an oath before the clerk.

The Secretary of State shall:
preserve a report required by subsection (a) of this section; and
equally with the clerk of a circuit court, be competent to certify the character and qualifications of an officer who has taken and subscribed an oath before the clerk.
